a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global research & development funding for infectious disease
Total annual funding reported to address neglected tropical diseases, emerging infectious diseases, and sexual &
Note: This data is expressed in constant constant 2022 US$. The dataset began tracking data on funding for neglected tropical diseases from
2007, emerging infectious diseases from 2014, and sexual & reproductive health from 2019.
